rukus.text: Aey nabi! Apni biwiyon say keh do kay agar tum zindaganiy-e-duniya aur zeenat-e-duniya chahati ho to aao mein tumhen kuch dey dila doon aur tumhen achaee kay sath tukhsat ker doon
Aur agar tumhari murad Allah aur uss ka rasool aur aakhirat ka ghar hai to (yaqeen mano kay) tum mein say nek kaam kerney waliyon kay liye Allah Taalaa ney boht zabardast ajar rakh choray hain
Aey nabi ki biwiyo! Tum mein say jo bhi khulli bey hayaee (ka irtikab) keray gi ussay dohra dohra azab diya jayega aur Allah Taalaa key nazdeek yeh boht hi sehal (si baat) hai
Aur tum mein say jo koi Allah ki aur uss kay rasool ki farman bardaari keray gi aur nek kaam keray gi hum ussay ajar (bhi) dohra den gay aur uss kay liye hum ney behtareen rozi tayyar ker rakhi hai

Aey nabi ki biwiyo! Tum aam aurton ki tarah nahi ho agar tum perhezgari ikhtiyar kero to naram lehjay say baat na kero kay jiss kay dil mein rog ho woh koi bura khayal keray aur haan qaeeday kay mutabiq kalam kero

Aur apnay gharon mein qarar say raho aur qadeem jahiliyat kay zamaney ki tarah apna banao ka izhar na kero aur namaz ada kerti raho aur zakat deti raho aur Allah aur uss kay rasool ki itaat guzari kero. Allah Taalaa yehi chahta hai kay aey nabi ki ghar waliyon! Tum say woh ( her qisam ki) gandagi ko door kerday aur tumhen khoob pak ker day
Aur tumharay gharon mein Allah ki jo aayaten aur rasool ki jo aahdees parhi jati hain unn ka zikar kerti raho yaqeenan Allah Taalaa lutf kerney wala khabar daar hai
